name: ANTPOCALYPSE
description:
Having a pet is fun, but having a hundred pets is some serious science! Can you fulfill all the needs of an ant colony? And if the ants are very smart? 

Run your own ant colony experiment and see how it goes. But we have to warn you: ants are not at all easy to work with!

Controls:

  • Just click things with the Left Mouse Button

Credits:

  • The game is made by Cidersaures Team
  • The font used in the game is Press Start 2P designed by CodeMan38
